Title: You Kill Me
Overview: While drying out on the West Coast, an alcoholic hit man befriends a tart-tongued woman who might just come in handy when it's time for him to return to Buffalo and settle some old scores.
Tagline: Professional alcoholic hit man gets life back on track thanks to her
production_companies: Echo Lake Productions, Bi-polar Pictures, Code Entertainment, Independent Film Group, Carol Baum Productions, Dillinger Productions, Green Tulip Productions
Cast: Ben Kingsley, Téa Leoni, Luke Wilson
